Edges-Professional -- Female Human Veteran Bard
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d6 Strength: d6 Vigor: d6
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Soldier: +1 Strength step (encumbrance)/May reroll Vigor (environmental hazards)
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Skills (22 Points):
Academics: (sma) d8+2 Performance: (spi) d8 Stealth: (agi) d6
Athletics: (agi) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d4 Survival: (sma) d8+2
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6+2 Repair: (sma) d8+2 Thievery: (agi) d6+1
Language (Common): (sma) d8 Riding: (agi) d6
Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Common; Ignan
Skill Notes:
Fix It: +2 Repair/Raise cuts time by half
Investigator: +2 Research/+2 Notice (sifting for information)
Scholar (Academics): +2 Academics
Scholar (Battle): +2 Battle
Scholar (Occult): +2 Occult
Scholar (Science): +2 Science
Thief: +1 Athletics (urban climbing)/+1 Stealth (urban)/+1 Thievery
Troubadour: +2 Common Knowledge/May use Performance in place of Battle
Woodsman: +2 Survival/+2 Stealth (wilds)
Ace: Ignores 2 penalty points on Boating, Driving, and Piloting; may spend Benny to Soak vehicle damage
Acrobat: May reroll Athletics (balance, tumble, or grapple)
All Thumbs: Suffers -2 using mechanical and electrical devices; critical failure breaks device
Armor Interference: -4 Performance and Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Born In The Saddle: May make free reroll on Riding; +2 mount Pace, +1 mount Run step
Danger Sense: +2 Notice (surprise)/Rolls Notice-2 in circumstances not normally subject to Notice
Jack-Of-All-Trades: Successful Smarts roll gives d4 (Raise d6) on chosen skill
Sharp Tongued: May substitute Performance for Taunt
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: Iomedae (Good)
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 6; Skill: 10
Features
Edges (5 points): Ace; Acrobat; Bard; Born In The Saddle; Combat Acrobat; Danger Sense; Fix It; Investigator; Jack-Of-All-Trades; Scholar (Academics); Scholar (Battle); Scholar (Occult); Scholar (Science); Soldier; Thief; Troubadour; Woodsman Hindrances: All Thumbs; Phobia; Quirk; Ruthless Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Bard: Has Arcane Background (Bard), Armor Interference, and Sharp Tongued features
Phobia: Suffers -1 on trait rolls in presence of phobia subject
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Combat
Parry: 2 (0) Cover: 0 Toughness: 7 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: None Weapons: Heavy Mace (d6+d8); Spiked Chain (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +3
Combat Acrobat: Foes suffer -1 attack when self aware of attack and unrestrained
Ruthless: Attacks those opposing personal goal
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Arcane Protection: (1 PP Abju) R10" Foes suffer -2 (Raise -4) on arcane attacks and damage against target for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP -4 (Raise -6) on arcane attacks and damage)
Beast Friend: (1/Size PP Ench) R10" Target can speak with and control beast actions for 10 min (+2 PP Affects magical beasts; +1 PP Effects last for 30 min; +1 PP Target can use beast's senses)
Empathy: (1 PP Ench) R10" Self learns target emotions and surface thoughts, gains +1 Intimidation, Persuasion, Performance, and Taunt (Raise +2; Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Makes uncooperative or neutral target cooperative (Raise friendly); +1 PP Effect lasts 5 min; +2 PP Self can detect target's lies)
Fear: (2 PP Necr) R10" Target Extra flees, Wild Card rolls on fear table (Spirit neg) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Inflicts Spirit-2 on Fear (Raise -4))
Healing: (3 PP Conj) RTouch Restores 1 wound (Raise 2) suffered in past hr (+10 PP Restores older wound; +15 PP Heals crippling injury; +2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius heals allies; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease)
Illusion: (3 PP Illu) R10" Creates 2" radius visual illusion (Smarts neg) for 5 rd (+1 PP 3" radius; +3 PP Inflicts Shaken (Raise wounds) (Smarts neg); +2 PP Effect lasts 5 min; +1/+2 PP Moves effect 12"/24"/rd; +1 PP Illusion includes sound; +2 PP Smarts-2)
Sound/Silence: (1 PP Illu) R50" Creates sound up to shout (Smarts neg) or R10" mutes 3" radius for 5 rd (+1 PP Smarts-2; +1 PP Moves effect 8"/rd; 1 PP/target (Spirit neg))
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes: Arcane Background (Bard): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
